about_the_game:
Get 15 digital postcards to send to your friends, and make a small donation to the developers at the same time!

You will find the postcards in the Steam game's root directory, inside the POSTCARDS subdirectory.

On Windows the path typically looks like this:

C:\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\BROKChristmas\POSTCARDS\

The postcards are available in several formats, with or without labels, and are ready for printing in A4 size paper.

For an even bigger donation, consider gifting the main game to a friend!
